articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: Brook completes sublime ton as England build lead - radio & text
articles.description: Follow live text updates and BBC Test Match Special commentary from day three of the second Test between England and Pakistan at the Multan Cricket Stadium.
articles.content:
An ugly heave and Robinson is bowled. That's 11 in the match for Abrar Ahmed.
That shot from Robinson confirms what we already knew, England are ready to get on with it now.
He was down the pitch t… [+65 chars]

articles.author: Edmund Tadros, Mark Di Stefano, Sam Buckingham-Jones
articles.title: Ten vows to ‘restore cricket to former prominence’ after $200m+ bid
articles.description: The network is making an aggressive bid to snatch the last top-tier sport on the market despite cricket’s recent lacklustre performance.
articles.content: Cricket Australia chief executive Nick Hockley is leading the negotiations. It has told the commercial broadcasters and pay TV operator Foxtel to ensure they have put up their best number in the hope… [+10110 chars]

articles.title: PCB hands Umar Akmal three-year ban from all cricket | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Penalty after the batsman pleaded guilty to not reporting corrupt approaches | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Umar Akmal's troubled cricket career has hit its biggest roadblock yet, with the PCB handing him a ban from all representative cricket for three years after he pleaded guilty of failing to report det… [+1506 chars]

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
